changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE "conversation" ( id serial PRIMARY KEY , offer_id INTEGER NOT NULL , customer_id INTEGER NOT NULL , created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , updated_at TIMESTAMP , FOREIGN KEY (offer_id) REFERENCES "offer" (id) , FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES "user" (id) );
CREATE TABLE "message" ( id serial PRIMARY KEY , conversation_id INTEGER NOT NULL , content varchar(1024) , created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , updatedAt TIMESTAMP , created_by INTEGER NOT NULL , FOREIGN KEY (conversation_id) REFERENCES "conversation" (id) , FOREIGN KEY (created_by) REFERENCES "user" (id) );
